bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted and shaped with PowerDiamond down tube, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: C-4 High Modolus Carbon and A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system (80-110m travel), Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

components.description: TruVativ Stylo Team w/Integrated BB Spindle, 22/32/44T
Geax Barro Maraton UST Tubless 26 X 2.1"
Shimano Deore XT Integrated Rapid Fire Shifter/Hydralic Brake Lever
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Rock Shox Reba Team 32mm stanchions, 100mm travel w/ Motion Control
Shimano Deore XT Dual Control Shifter/Hydraulic Brake Lever 27-speed
WTB Rocket V Stealth w/ Cro-Mo Rails
